cause.description:
It is the mission of NewYork-Presbyterian Hospital to be a leader in the provision of world class patient care, teaching, research, and service to local, state, national, and international communities. The Hospital combines the best clinical and administrative practices of all its divisions, building on the strengths of each, to become the premier integrated academic health center in the United States.
1. high quality and compassionate patient care
2. outstanding clinical education to physicians, biomedical scientists, and other healthcare professionals
3. innovative healthcare research and scientific discovery
4. responsible and proactive community service
5. unmatched service to patients, families, and visitors
6. a safe work environment, competitive compensation, and the opportunity for career advancement to its staff.
